import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Grant Admin Permissions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/admins/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Grant [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions to a user.

You can find more information about roles [here](../../docs/guides/auth/roles).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/auth/roles#admins) permissions is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"ObjectId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
